# gx-query-viewer-element-format

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute           | Description                | Type                        | Default     |
| ---------------- | ------------------- | -------------------------- | --------------------------- | ----------- |
| `canDragToPages` | `can-drag-to-pages` | If true cand drag to pages | `boolean`                   | `undefined` |
| `formatStyle`    | `format-style`      | Format style               | `string`                    | `undefined` |
| `maximumValue`   | `maximum-value`     | Max value                  | `string`                    | `undefined` |
| `picture`        | `picture`           | Format on values           | `string`                    | `undefined` |
| `subtotals`      | `subtotals`         | How to show subtotals      | `"Hidden" \| "No" \| "Yes"` | `undefined` |
| `targetValue`    | `target-value`      | Target value               | `string`                    | `undefined` |

| Event            | Description | Type               |
| ---------------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `elementChanged` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
